xwikidoc.content: {{velocity output="false"}} #macro(generateDisplayEditLink $displayEditLink $changeDoc) #if ("$!displayEditLink" == 'true') #set ($xredirect = "$doc.getURL('view')") #set ($hrefAttribute = "$changeDoc.getURL('edit', ""xredirect=$xredirect"")") #set ($displayEditLinkMarkup = "{{html clean='false'}}{{/html}}") #else #set ($displayEditLinkMarkup = '') #end #end #macro(displayScreenshots $changeObject $useGallery $alwaysDisplayScreenshots) #set ($screenshotReferences = $changeObject.getValue('screenshots')) #if ("$!screenshotReferences" == '' && $alwaysDisplayScreenshots) #set ($screenshotReferences = $services.model.serialize($services.model.resolveAttachment('no_image_thumb.png', ${xcontext.macro.doc.documentReference}))) #end #if ("$!screenshotReferences" != '') #if ($useGallery) {{gallery width="420px" height="315px"}} #end ## Make sure we have an absolute reference #foreach($screenshotReference in $screenshotReferences.split(',')) #set ($screenshotReference = $screenshotReference.trim()) #if (!$screenshotReference.contains('@')) #set ($screenshotReference = $services.model.serialize($services.model.resolveAttachment($screenshotReference, $changeObject.reference))) #end #if ($useGallery) [[image:$screenshotReference]] #else #if ($foreach.count > 1) #end [[image:$screenshotReference||style="border:1px solid silver;"]] #end #end #if ($useGallery) {{/gallery}} #end #end #end {{/velocity}}
